1.content:
As far back as anyone can remember there have always been anthros and humans. Sadly times between the two have not always been peaceful, bigots on both sides inciting their respective kin to hatred and violence yet that was millennia ago. After peace was brokered humans and anthros played off each others strengths, working together they've built a near-utopian society where all may live in relative happiness. This is of course the world we now know today.

One of the greatest advantages of this new world is the level of acceptance contained within. At one time love between a human and a furry would have been seen as vile or evil just like the love between two men or two women, however this isn't no more. Relationships between genders, and species flourish and thrive be they open-ended or closed relationships many find peace and solace in the ones they've come to love.

Opportunities abound no matter the tastes of the individual, and if you look hard enough you're sure to find what you're looking for. In this new world many of the old social taboos are much more laid-back, nudity in public is allowed except when the weather makes it too cold for humans to do anything but cover up (not fair for the anthros to be walking around nude simply due to fur). Many businesses allow and even encourage nudity whether you be the executive of a company or something like a stripper. Science has advanced greatly in the last few decades and there are whispers that "magic" has been discovered although they can't be confirmed.

How will you live your life? What type of relationship will you have? It's all up to you.

For starters pick your race (human/furry) and sexuality.
1.title: Setting the stage

111.title: Slot 1

112.content:
Welcome to Los Angeles, one of the most crime-ridden cities in the city. A city the Spectre so aptly describes as bringing out the worst in people. It been like that for decades. While humans and anthros are all different on the inside, every species had a potential for good and evil. This was something that one young police detective transferred to the Van Nuys knew very well.

This was Jim Davidson, a young cop who as he watched from the bullet train that brought him into town, saw all sorts of sin, fear and wickedness covering the town. Slums, graveyards, crime scenes. It made him shiver as he saw what was going on. He even heard a few gun shots. For the neighborhood right out of Hollywood, things had really gone to hell and they were still going. From his window, Jim could see a mugging take place and it made him shake his head. "What happened to this city?" he asked. "L.A. has really let itself go. What could've possibly gone wrong.

The bus stopped and Jim stepped out. There were humans and anthros walking down the street. Jim could even spot a drunk tortoise man stumbling down the street but hiding to the side as Jim entered the station. It was dark and from the sound of it, it was underneath the railing with the bullet trains. "The mayor of this city is insane." Said Jim.

Jim walked into the room and saw that the entire police force was made up of anthros. It was dark enough that he could barely tell what kind of anthros they were, but what he did know from their shadows that they were anything but human. He had no time to question because he was walking into the chief's office.

"So you're finally here, Detective Davidson," said the chief. "Sorry about the lights. The power is out." From Jim's perspective, he couldn't tell whether or not the chief was a human or an anthro. "I didn't like what I saw of L.A., Chief." The chief let out a sigh. "I'm sorry, Detective. But crime is running more rampant than ever before. Which is why we've had to outsource. Your partner will be joining you. She's a detective just like you."

"Partner?" asked Jim in surprise. Before Jim could say anything else, he heard a door opening and saw his new partner. She was...
112.title: L.A. Blues

choices: The car lights turn on and Davison sees Abi's huge cow breasts
Same as the first choice but Abi has a bulge at her groin too
1122.content:
Jim looks over to the opening doors but can't really see who or what walked in. Once the shadowy figure reaches him and the chief he finds out it's a woman.

"Morning chief, sorry I'm late. It's kinda hard navigating this place without any lights."

The chief introduces Jim to his new partner. "This is Abi your new partner, she'll accompany you on your investigations and patrols from now. You can't be too careful with the city as it is"

"But sir I..." Jim was cut off by Abi as he tried to lodge a complaint.

"Is this going to be the whole "sir I work alone " business. Really??? I thought you'd be the first one to take up a partner in such a dangerous city." Abi states incredulously, surprise at his lack of foresight evident in her voice.

"She's right." The chief pitches in trying to smooth out their relationship before it started on the wrong foot.

"Fine I'll go on patrol with her." Jim walks out to the garage and waits for Abi near his cruiser.

As he waits he starts to realise that it would help having someone else. Regardless of this fact he still thinks that she'll only get in the way. After a few minutes Abi finds the car. "There you are detective. What the hell you doing here?"

"I'm waiting to go on patrol, get in if you're joining." Abi gets in once prompted, though reluctantly. Once she's buckled up he starts the car.

1131.title: Strange Cat

1141.content:
Frazone was lonely. Lack of social skills had left him with no close friends since moving away from home. It was very disheartening especially since one of the reasons he left was to find a girlfriend. After expressing his frustrations with his co workers, Frazone was recommended to get a pet. A pet in this instance being a small anthro.

“Dud keeping a small anthro has a pet is wrong?”. Frazone objected to his coworkers statement. Has they cataloged samples.

“No, no it's not like that” Joal the anthro cat besides him replied. “Pet is not a legal term in this instance. They keep all their rights and freedoms. They just choose to live in the home of a larger person, so they are called pets.”

“Why would someone do that?”. Frazone shook his head.

“Why wouldn't they?” Joel exclaimed. “Most pets don't even work, at all. And in places like this it's hard being small. It's just not built to accommodate them. I have three little mice at my place. It's great”

“Seems like it would be awkward to me”. Although Frazone didn't look up he was no longer working.

“It's less awkward than dating trust me.” Joel laughed. “From my experience both parties are much more open about telling each other what they want and expect. It's kinda like a business deal except people are actually happy.”. Frazone didn't respond so Joel continued. “This website Takemehome.com is the best place to meet a pet if you are interested". Frazone didn't respond but for the rest of the day he couldn't stop thinking about it.

That night Frazone checked out the website. The front page depicted a blue humanoid shape holding a smaller pink humanoid in its arm standing besides the words Take Me Home with some more small blue and pink humanoid shapes on and in the words in various ways. After thoroughly reading all the new users page Frazone finally made an account before going to bed. Having to wait for a pet to take interest in him.

After returning from work the next day Frazone immediately checked his profile. He found a list of new contacts and two messages. The first was a generic message from the website itself. The second was titled “you may be who I'm looking for.”. Frazone was surprised to see this. The way the website usually works is that each pet is regularly given a list of hosts based on their defined criteria which they then approve or not. Once approved the pet is made a contact of the host for them to approach.

Dear Frazone Dracaoo. This message was actually structured like a letter.

I have had the pleasure of reading your profile and you seem like such a sweet person. Truth is i never actually wanted to be a pet, but maintaining a job, my own place and college has become too much for me too handle on my own.

It has been very anxious for me looking for a host close enough for me to continue my studies, that will also respect my personal space. I will still share affection. It has been rather lonely, and the way you described how you feel was very touching.

If you are interested please contact me and we can arrange a face to face meeting. I sincerely hope you will consider me. Love Pangea.

Frazone hurried to check Pangea’s profile. She was a light green Nimbat, with purple eyes. She was simply adorable. Likes video games parties, and pizza. Looking for someone to feed and shelter her while she completes college. Physicality occasional petting and cuddling.
1141.title: Take Me Home

151332.content: Jackson, a tall, well-built, egotistical grey and white wolf, who's quite popular with the ladies.
151332.title: More choices.

1513321.content:
Bright blue sky, crystal clear waters, hot, sandy beaches, a palm tree with a chair underneath, and a drink in hand; what more could a wolf ask for?

Wearing nothing but a pair of black sunglasses and a red speedo, his hands resting behind his head, Jackson, a seven foot, 300 pound wolf, watched one of the many beautiful sight that this paradise had to offer: two females playing volleyball.

They stood opposite of each other, smacking the ball over the net, trying to score a point for themselves, sending sand flying every time they jumped and landed, their assets wobbling.

The one on the right was a cat, her snow-white bikini a great contrast to her bantam-black fur. She was tall and muscular but still had a curvy form, with large breasts.

The other, on the left, was more on the chubby and short side. She was a fox-like animal with creamy-yellow fur, supporting long, pointy ears, wearing a black and yellow swimming suit, her bushy tail swaying majestically behind her.

Jackson could feel blood rushing to his member, but he did his best to suppress it in order to avoid embarrassment and public indecency.

Suddenly, due to her misjudgment of direction, the fox accidentally knocked the ball to far to her left, sending it flying in Jackson's direction.

The ball crashed into the ground, rolling over the rough sand, quickly losing velocity and coming to a complete halt when it bumped into the wolf's chair.

Leaning over, Jackson picked up the ball just when the fox came running up to him, wanting to retrieve it.

"Here ya go, cutie," he said, attempting a smile but unfortunately ending up as a grin.

The fox blushed, taking the ball from him, saying, "Thanks."

She turned around and ran back, and Jackson had the privilege to watch how her plumb bottom working to do this. The fox went back to the net, but it took a while before they start playing again, for the cat stopped her, exchanging a conversation.

They looked towards Jackson for a few moments, and the cat raised an eyebrow, but they went back playing.

"Wonder what that was all about," thought Jackson.
1513321.title: At the beach.

1513322.content: William, a 5'7 black, yellow and white wolf who lives with his brother, Kevin. He's recently just managed to score a date with a grey dragoness named Helen.
1513322.title: more characters.

15133221.content:
"What should I wear, what should I wear?" William Parker the wolf thought to himself as he stood in front of his mirror.

With two shirts in his hands, he compared them by pressing it against his body, imagining he was wearing it. One was black, which would match his dark fur on his back, but the the other was white, which would bring out the fur on his belly.

He had to decide, and he had to decide quickly, or he would be late for his very first date! It was hard to believe but scoring a girl was a lot easier than William thought. His older brother, Kevin, always made it sound like it was a professional's job, where lots of rules, tricks, a regulations were required.

He was also informed that the best spot to practice this was at some random bar. William always envied how Kevin brought one women after another to their house, almost convinced to give his brother's advice a try, but he soon learned that all of Kevin's dates were only one-nigh-stands, that they were only there to have "fun" with him before they leave him.

William didn't want that. He wanted a genuine relationship, a relationship based on love, not sex. He finally found such a relationship at his own workplace, and all he had to do is be himself and ask. It was really that simple!

With one finale decision, he chose the black shirt, throwing it over his shoulders and fastening his buttons. He casted one last look in the mirror, making sure his complexion was glossy enough. When he was satisfied, William popped a breath-mint into his maw and headed towards the house's garage.

XxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxX

William stared at the red mustang before him, a beautiful and powerful piece of machine that was upgraded throughout the years. It was the perfect car to impress a few ladies. It was such a shame that it did not belong to William.

It was his brother's car, and Kevin would be damed if he loaned the thing for him. And even if he managed to convince him through some miracle, William would still not be able to drive it, for it had been going through some technical difficulties lately.

At this very moment the car was jacked-up, and his brother was under it and fixing the problem, tools scattered all over the floor.

No, this would not be his ride for tonight. Instead, his own transportation was hidden in a dark corner: a yellow motor scooter.

As he was pulling the vehicle out towards the open garage door, which revealed the fading twilight outside, a helmet on his head, Kevin slid out from under the car, a grin on his face.

"So, going out to meet your girl, hey?" he said.

William nodded, saying: "Yeah. I'll be home in a few hours."

"Remember, Will, what taught you," he said, his grin growing wider, "it's sure to get you in bed with her."

William rolled his eyes at his brother's vulgar joke. "Whatever," he said.

He started the engine and drove off.
15133221.title: Date night.

15133222.content: Boris, a 6'3 wild boar. He's very muscular, though, he has been struggling with his weight recently. He has very dark brown fur with and red fur that begins at his face and runs all the way down to his crotch. Two tusks portray from the side of his mouth. His features give him a tough appearance, but he is surprisingly gentle.
15133222.title: More ideas

151332221.content:
Rachel was coming over to Boris' apartment for dinner, and the warthog knew, as he plunged the key into his key into the door, opening it and entering his property, that had at least a few hours to freshen up.

He quickly jumped out of his overalls, but when he climbed into his shower sideways, like he always did due to his amount of bulk, his large beer-belly got wedged between him and the shower's walls.

"Come on, you dame thing!" he growled.

Sucking in his gut, giving him enough room, Boris squeezed himself through. Ones loose, he gave his stomach a angry look.

Like his hair on his head, face, and chest, the sphere was covered in bright orange hair, running all the way to his crotch.

Giving it a slap, watching it jiggle, he said to himself: "Dame thing keeps getting bigger everyday. I really need to lay it off the snacks."

He just hope that his date would not notice his new gain; she had quite a sharp eye. Twisting the knobs, water began to flow out of the shower head, and he washed himself thoroughly.

Climbing out, he wrapped a towel around his waist and headed towards his room. Throwing open his wardrobe, he began to look through his clothing until he found the right outfit: a white shirt, a black pair of pants and shoes.

"Need to look my best," he said with a grin.

He then began to prepare dinner; a nice stake with a few vegetables and spices, nothing too complex. While the stakes roasted in the oven, he set up his round table with a few candles, plates, wine glasses, knives and forks.

As he was busy switching off his stove, attempting to pull out the stakes, Boris suddenly heard a knock on the door, and he knew very well who it was.

"O, no, not now!" he thought, "Everything's not ready yet."

Not wanting her to knock again (for he felt that it would mean that he rude), he quickly went and opened the door.

Rachel was a Doberman with black and brown fur, who had short and sleek her, which she always allowed to droop over her left eye.

Wearing a red dress and shoes, smelling of fresh roses, Boris had to admit that she looked a little strange. It was not that she looked ugly in it. In fact, her sleek and tall body looked very good in a dress, ten spite her muscular form.

But it was her personality that didn't fit her clothing: Rachel was a mechanic, a typical tomboy that wasn't afraid to get her hands dirty.

Seeing her dressed in such a prissy way was rather weird for Boris.

"Good to see you, Rachel," the warthog said, "You look great, but I wasn't expected you so early."

Rachel lifted an eyebrow. "What?" she said, ''Did you expect us girls to take forever to get our business done? Horrible stereotyping. So, are you going to invite me in."

"O, sorry," said Boris, smiling sheepishly, stepping aside, spreading out one strong arm. "Right this way."

She stepped inside while he closed the door behind her. She looked around, her eyes everywhere.

"Nice place you got here," Rachel complimented.

Boris's apartment was a cheap rent, but it was rather spacious and was in a decent neighborhood. Usually there would pizza boxes, food packets, and clothing laying around, a sign that he was letting himself go, but he cleaned it up for this occasion.

"It's not much, but I'm glad you like it," he said.

"I see you got everything ready for us," Rachel said when she saw the decked table.

"I tried my best," Boris said with a grin, blushing, one hand scratching behind his head.

His mind suddenly reminded him of something, and he said: "Oops, forgot about the food. Excuse me while I go get it."

As he moved towards his kitchen, Boris' still kept talking, his voice dwindling but still audible. "I'm sorry about this. I would have have gotten this sooner out."

"It's no problem," called Rachel, who was now sitting at the dinner table. "Take your time; I'm in no hurry."

A few moments later Boris came back, holding a deep tray of steaming steak and vegetables, setting it on the table.

They ate heartily that evening, drinking wine, focusing more on each other than their food, chatting, making jokes, discussing their problems.

After their dinner, Boris was taking away their plates, eating utensils, and wine glasses, putting it in the sink.

Rachel was still sitting at the table, eying in a way that made him feel uncomfortable, her legs crossed.

Pushing back the feeling, he said: "Thanks for coming over. It gets kinda lonely here."

"You mean that I should go home already?" Rachel asked, frowning.

"Well I..." began Boris nervously.

But he was cut off when Rachel continued, smiling this time: "We haven't had desert yet."

"Dessert?" the warthog said, growing confused.

She stood up walking towards in a strut, swinging her hips. Boris grew nervous, and he found himself blushing.

Rachel leaned so close to him, standing on her toes, that he could smell her minty-fresh breath.

She said, "Use your imagination and you'll know what I mean."

She grabbed his shirt and pulled him into his room.
151332221.title: Dinner with a friend.

1513322211.content:
Boris couldn't believe it. He was going to get laid on his very first date, by a women he had a crush on for years. Blushing such a deep shade of red that it was giving his fur a red tint, the warthog pulled down Rachel's zipper on her dress.

Wiggling a little, it fell down towards the ground, pooling around her feet. Boris was expecting to do her underwear next, but to his surprising he discovered that she wore none.

He could have sworn that he heard angels singing as she turned around, her ample breasts in both hands, squashing them together, revealing all her glorious body had to offer.

"Your turn now," she said, stepping closer, pulling the warthog's shirt out of his pants.

Rachel began to undo Boris' buttons, beginning from his neck and ending at the bottom. He pulled off his shirt, waiting for her to do the rest, but it would seem that she had stopped.

Her eyes were focused on Boris' overhanging belly, looking at it with curiosity. She took it in her hands, squeezing the ball of fat like she was kneading dough.

Boris sighed. "I know," he said, " It keeps getting bigger and bigger. I've been making plans to go to a gym. I hope it doesn't disgust you in any way."

She smiled and looked at Boris. "Not at all."

She stood on her toes again, leaning forward and giving his flat snout a kiss.

"In fact," Rachel continued, "I like a guy with a little meat on them. I heard they're the ones that are best in bed. More to hold on to, they say."

Boris could feel how the pressure from his bulging member was relieved as Rachel unfastened his belt, pulling down his pants.

"You know," said Boris, "I have something in these pants of mine that's almost as big as me belly, and you'll like it even more."

"O, I know, big boy," said Rachel, pulling down his underwear, "I know."

The rest of the night was filled with passion Boris could not begin to describe. He filled every hole on Rachel's body with seed; her mouth, her anus, her vagina. She proved to be even more durable than Boris, going on for a long while.

After a long while, when the hours were dragging into the early morning, did they finally stop. Laying fast asleep in his arms, Boris watched Rachel sleep, feeling a great need to protect and love her to the end of his days.

He had a feeling that there was a bright future ahead of him.
1513322211.title: A passionate night.

153132.content: How about Jeanette, a shy, 5'6 foot, yellow and white fox.
153132.title: Someone else

choices: the men suddenly wants her to join an eating contest.
her friend, Helen, comes looking for her.
1531321.content:
The water was boiling when Jeanette poured it into her cup. The coffee steamed, releasing a pleasant odor. She cradled it in her paws and walked towards the window, staring out from her apartment at the beach only a mile away.

With her keen eyes she could spot small shapes moving across the sand and swimming in the water. The beach was packed today, which came as no surprise to her. It was Saturday, and everyone goes to the beach on that day...except for her.

Jeanette could never go to major social gatherings without the help of her friends. She was too shy and awkward when she went alone.

She stared at the beach with a longing expression. How she wished she could talk more easily, make new friends, and get herself a boyfriend.

The phone rang. Jeanette quickly rushed to pick it up.

"Hello?" She answered.

"Hey, Jeanette," a cheery voice came from the other end.

She knew that voice well; it belonged to her friend Helen, an anthro cheetah.

"I was thinking of coming over to you today," Helen said.

"Well of course you can," Jeanette said.

"Thanks," was the last word Helen said before the fox putted the phone down.

A few minutes later, a knock came upon Jeanette's door. She opened it and Helen came walking in, dressed in a bikini.

"You ready to go?" she asked.

"Go where?" Jeanette asked, confused.

"To the beach, duh!"

She suddenly threw a swimming suit on Jeanette's table.

"O," was the only thing she said.

She got herself dressed and went outside where Helen's car was parked outside.

The drove off, and in a few minutes they were at the beach. It was crowded, just like Jeanette expected, and there were men everywhere: some were fat, some were sticks, some were complete studs, and others were average.

The men, as expected, shot Helen and Jeanette looks, obviously attracted to them. But the fox didn't like the attention and huddled closely to her friend.

They went swimming in the ocean for a while, then went to get something to eat at a hotdog stand before the went sun-bathing.

Jeanette was slipping into her comfort zone, enjoying the heat of the sun on her fur, when she heard the thick, masculine voice of a man.

"Hey there, babe," he said.

She opened her eyes and beheld a muscular man staring down at her, wearing dark glasses and red shorts.

"Hmm, hello," she said in a small voice.

"Wanna take a walk with me?" he asked.

Jeanette panicked, looking over to her friend for help, but, alas, Helen was too preoccupied bathing in the sun to listen to her.

Too polite to say no, she excepted the man's offer.

"By the way, names Jack," he said, flashing her a smile.

"Jeanette," the foxgirl offered.

The walked for a while, exchanging stories about themselves, and Jeanette discovered that talking to someone wasn't that hard after all.

The came to a stop at a gazebo, and Jeanette saw that there were other men there as well, grilling, drinking, and having a good time.

She felt a little bit afraid, being the only girl in the group, but she calmed down and joined Jack's friends.

While there...

15313221.title: A relaxing evening.

15313222.content: How about Marley the Naga and Harvey the crocodile.
15313222.title: No.

153132221.content:
"What are you doing here?" The question (though it sounded more like a accusation) kept repeating itself in my mind like one of those old, broken cassette players, and even after I offered it whatever weak explanation there was, it revised to relent.

"You should go home." Yes, perhaps I should go home, make myself some hot tea with extra sugar, slither into bed with the lamp burning beside me, and read a cheesy romance novel...

But no, I was miles away from my apartment, sitting coiled up in the back of one of my friend's car, which was parked somewhere in a urban district outside some nightclub. "The Studs' Mansion" the yellow neon light flashed at me, and I stared at it nervously, biting my lower lip.

"Calm down, Marley," my friend in the driver's seat said. "Everything will be fine, you'll see."

Claudine was a arctic fox with, not surprisingly, a pelt as white as snow. But she had dyed for this occasion, and now a blue strip, which complimented her eyes nicely, ran from the top of her head all the way down to her back.

"Yeah," Claudine's sister agreed next to her, "We promise that we'll have the best night of our lives!"

Maud was the twin sister of Claudine, and, as expected, they were both identical in appearance, but the only thing separating them in looks were their eyes; while Claudine's were a soft baby blue, Maud's was a sharp acid green.

Like her sister, Maud had also dyed her fur in a similar fashion, but the strip was green instead of blue.

"I hope so," I murmured to myself.

We climbed out of the car, and Claudine and Maud strolled confidently to the the club's entrance. I slithered behind them, my long, yellow Naga body trailing behind me. I eyed my surroundings cautiously, as if something was going to jump out of the shadows of the night. I clutch my handbag tightly to my chest.

The bouncer at the entrance was a wall of muscle, a eight foot tall ape dressed in a casual shirt and jeans. Leaning against the wall, he watched us approach with a bored expression on his face.

Claudine walked up to him and said: "We have a reservation here, V.I.P, I believe. You'll find it under Claudine Westwall."

The bouncer's face seemed to light up at what she said. "Just a moment," he said with a voice that seemed to rumble the very ground.

He began to type something with his big fingers on the tablet held in his huge hands.

Cracking a smile, which I found rather frightening, he said, "Found it. Follow me ladies."

We did as he asked, following him into the club. As we followed the bouncer down the dark hallway, the sound of electronic music became louder and louder, up until the point when it was deafening.

He finally emerged into a cavernous room, which was packed full with women, and a few men here and there, of many species. They were all sipping on some alcoholic drink, watching half-naked to completely naked men dance on poles.

It was strange seeing the roles reversed. The women cheered as loudly as males with muscles as hard as diamond dance before them, throwing away their garments until they stood before them with their junk hanging freely.

I blushed hard at the sight of this. But we weren't going down their tonight. O no. We were getting our own private show. Instead, we were being led across the room to another hallway. The noise of the music grew muffled.

We came to a big red door. The bouncer opened it and ushered us in. The room inside, like the door, was completely red: the walls had red wallpaper, with pictures of black flowers dotting it, the large, soft sofa was red, and the well-vacuumed carpet was red.

There was a stage opposite to the sofa, and a few poles were mounted on it.

"Make yourself comfortable, ladies," the bouncer said, still giving us that frightening grin, "I'll just get the boys ready for you."

And with that said, he quickly left. We made ourselves, like requested, comfortable on the big red sofa.
153132221.title: To the club.

1531322211.content:
Bitter and humiliating, the two emotion I felt as I stood in the backstage if some private show. I studied myself in the mirror and couldn't help but groan; dressed in a yellow hammock suite, which was designed to fit me poorly and leave very little for the imagination, I looked ridiculous.

Dammit! I couldn't believe Jim and Tim was able to talk me into doing this. Me and them are going to have a little talk about this shit...No, I was blame-shifting again. It wasn't his fault that I was in this mess. The real culprit here was the failing economy.

A few weeks ago I lost my job after the factory closed down where I worked at, and a unemployed person that was about to be kicked out of his house due to outstanding payments grew pretty desperate. Hell, he might even consider becoming a striper!

I tore my gaze away from and glanced at my co-workers beside me. Tim (who was a tiger) and Jim (who was a orca) were admiring themselves in the mirrors, completely in their element. The tight speedos they wore, which emphasized their privates, didn't seem to bother them at all, and they flexed their impressive forms, making typical remarks about how well they looked.

This caused me to study myself as well. To tell you the truth I was just as muscular as them, but a good deal of fat covered my muscular figure. Most of it, unfortunately, settled in my midsection, which resulted in me having a solid gut about the size of a beach ball.

It had the infamous ability to draw any one's attention away from my other muscular assets. Perhaps it was the reason why I hadn't found a girl yet. I promised myself, when this charade was over, hit I'll hit the gym and stop snacking.

"Hey, Harvey, you ready for this?" I heard Tim ask.

I snapped from my trance. "I-I guess so," I answered.

Jim noticed the slight nervous tone in my voice, and he said, "Relax, buddy. They're only women. They don't bite...at least not often."

I rolled my eyes at the orca's remark, and said, "It's not that. It's..."

I trailed off, for the ground began to shake, and we knew who was coming. The door opened and Brutus came lumbering in to the room.

"You boys ready?" he asked with that thick voice of his.

We told him that we were ready. He nodded, but before he left we pulled him aside.

"Listen here, bud," I said in a whisper, "Is it really necessary that we do this? It makes me feel uncomfortable."

"Come on, Harvey, don't chicken out out on us now," he said, "A little nudity never killed anyone."

"It's not that!" I snapped, "I mean what we have to do afterwards."

Brutus shook his head in annoyance. "Listen here, gator boy," he said, his face hardening, "the clients payed a full amount and they will get the full treatment in return. That's how it works."

I shrank back a little. Brutus had that ability to intimidate almost anyone with his demeanor.

"I know, but still," I said, rubbing my thick arm.

Brutus' face softened a bit, and he said, "Look, I know you're new here and this thing we do might make you uncomfortable. Hell, I know a few guys who have done this for years and still feel uncomfortable. But remember that you're being payed good money for this."

I nodded. I was glad that the salary for doing this job wasn't small. It was almost twice the amount I earned at the factory!

"Now, go get them tiger," Brutus said, flashing me that terrifying smile which, besides his size, he was known for around here.

"I'm a alligator," I corrected.

"Whatever," he said with a flick of his huge hand.

I followed Tim and Jim to the stage.
1531322211.title: Backstage.

155.content: Alright so you're a hermaphrodite (have both male and female genitalia) or are interested in one. Considering most of the options have already been done, I'm just going to put character/story slots here, and the author can choose the species/partner (whether they want to be the herm, date one....etc)
155.title: Hermaphrodites

info.brief_description: Life in a world of humans and furries
info.description:
This is a world where humans and anthros have together since the beginning of time. It's basically like the modern day world, but there is the possibility for science/magic that would allow for most people's dreams to come true. Due to the combination of cultures the world is much more "accepting" and things such as nudity are much more acceptable in most places, relationships between humans and anthros is obviously okay.

Rules:
1. Any person may be used, 1st, 2nd, 3rd...etc
2. Any type of relationship is allowed, human on furry, furry on human, gay, straight, multiple partners...go wild.
3. Herm characters, both as the MC and to have a relationship with are allowed.
4. Any type of character can be used, scalie, avian, furry, marine heck if you want to use game/comic/anime characters go ahead.
5. There is a 3 paragraph minimum for any chapter, and while choice chapters may be as small as one sentence, I encourage writing more.
6. Any fetish except toilet (including farting), vore, weight gain, and death are allowed.
7. Once you've chosen your race and sexuality you're free to start, just leave an other option as the last one in case someone want to make their own story
8. Have fun.

As an added bonus, any chapter that is decent and meets the paragraph minimum gets 1000GPs.
info.pretty_title: It's an Anthro World After All
